short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get detailed information on churches around the world. Perfect for tourists and believers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ChurchMapped Extension for Google Chrome is perfect for tourists and believers who are keen to get more information about a church they intend to see on their next holiday or pilgrimage or even just out of curiosity - totally for free. Thinking of visiting Rome to see St. Peter's Basilica? Or Cologne Cathedral in Germany? Or the Sagrada Familia in Spain? As you browse through the web, the ChurchMapped Extension for Google Chrome looks for cues that give an indication of a church you would likely be interested in on your next trip. It then offers a recommendation, signified by a notification, and connects you to our YouTube channel - watched for countless hours by people from around the world - with our extensive directory of coverage of churches right around the world. The ChurchMapped Extension for Google Chrome is a must-have for anyone who enjoys travelling or simply wants to get a tour of churches right around the world. You absolutely must download the extension as you are about to book a hotel or jet-off to an idyllic island in the sunset.

With the ChurchMapped Extension, you can also search for Mass times, Confession times, Adoration times, events and funerals for churches across the world*. Simply type in the name of the church, or alternatively, type in a time such as "9:00".

ChurchMapped is a social network and travel company that specialises in churches around the world. It also offers a games, jobs, dating and music service too.

*The following countries are covered by the search facility in the ChurchMapped Extension for Google Chrome:
- United Kingdom (August 2021)
- Republic of Ireland (September 2021)
- Cape Verde... (September 2021)

..More countries are across the world are being added frequently.

Updates: 8th August 2021 - You can now search for churches within your browser. Simply type "ChurchMapped" and the name of the church in order to find the desired information.
- St. Stephen's Basilica, Budapest, Hungary has now been added to the ChurchMapped Extension for Google Chrome

DISCLAIMER: ChurchMapped is an independent social network and travel company. The ChurchMapped Extension for Google Chrome is not associated with any church, diocese or ecclesiastical organisation. Our privacy policy can be found at https://www.churchmapped.com/privacy-policy.html.
